mapper.insert: INSERT INTO friend(friendNum, userId, notice, subject, content, sDate, eDate) VALUES(#{friendNum}, #{userId}, #{notice}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{sDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
INSERT INTO friendFile(friendFileNum, friendNum, saveFilename,originalFilename,fileSize) VALUES(FRIENDF_SEQ.nextval, #{friendNum},#{saveFilename},#{originalFilename},#{fileSize})
mapper.select:
SELECT f.friendNum,f.userId,userName,subject,content,hitCount,f.created FROM friend f JOIN member2 m2 ON f.userId=m2.userId
and notice=1 and deleted=0
ORDER BY f.friendNum DESC

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM friend f JOIN member2 m2 ON f.userId=m2.userId
and notice=0

SELECT f.friendNum,f.userId,userName,subject,content,hitCount,f.created, sDate, eDate, f.enable, deleted, deleteId, NVL(fileCount,0) fileCount, NVL(replyCount,0) replyCount, NVL(bookmarkCount,0) bookmarkCount FROM friend f JOIN member2 m2 ON f.userId=m2.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT friendNum, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM friendFile GROUP BY friendNum ) ff On f.friendNum=ff.friendNum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT friendNum, COUNT(*) replyCount FROM friendReply GROUP BY friendNum ) r On f.friendNum=r.friendNum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT friendNum, COUNT(*) bookmarkCount FROM friendBookMark GROUP BY friendNum ) fb On f.friendNum=fb.friendNum
and notice != 1
ORDER BY f.friendNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS fETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY

SELECT f.friendNum,f.userId,userName,subject,content,hitCount,f.created,sDate, eDate,f.enable, notice, NVL(fileCount,0) fileCount ,NVL(replyCount,0) replyCount, NVL(bookmarkCount,0) bookmarkCount,nvl(myBookMark,0) myBookMark FROM friend f JOIN member2 m2 ON f.userId=m2.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT friendNum, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM friendFile GROUP BY friendNum ) ff On f.friendNum=ff.friendNum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT friendNum, COUNT(*) replyCount FROM friendReply GROUP BY friendNum ) r On f.friendNum=r.friendNum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT friendNum, COUNT(*) bookmarkCount FROM friendBookMark GROUP BY friendNum ) fb On f.friendNum=fb.friendNum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT friendNum, userid, COUNT(*) myBookMark FROM friendBookMark where userid=#{userId} and friendNum=#{friendNum} group by friendNum, userid ) fb1 On f.friendNum=fb1.friendNum WHERE f.friendNum=#{friendNum}

SELECT friendNum, subject,f.created FROM friend f JOIN member2 m2 ON f.userId=m2.userId
AND (friendNum > #{friendNum}) AND notice != 1 AND deleted = 0
ORDER BY friendNum ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT friendNum, subject,f.created FROM friend f JOIN member2 m2 ON f.userId=m2.userId
AND (friendNum < #{friendNum}) AND notice != 1 AND deleted = 0
ORDER BY friendNum DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

VALUES (FRIENDREPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{friendNum}, #{content}, #{answer, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secret})
mapper.select: select friendReplyNum, userId, userName, friendNum, content, created, NVL(answer,0) answer, secret, NVL(answerCount, 0) answerCount, deleted, deleteId from( select friendReplyNum, fr.userId, userName, fr.friendNum, content, fr.created, fr.answer, secret, NVL(answerCount, 0) answerCount , deleted, deleteId from friendReply fr JOIN MEMBER2 m2 on m2.userId = fr.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT answer, COUNT(*) answerCount FROM friendReply WHERE answer!=0 GROUP BY answer ) a ON fr.friendReplyNum = a.answer WHERE fr.friendNum=#{friendNum} ORDER BY friendReplyNum DESC) START WITH answer IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR friendReplyNum = answer OFFSET #{offset} ROWS fETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
